document.full_text: girls who spend lots of time playing high-impact sports including gymnastics and basketball are twice as likely to suffer a small crack in their bones than girls who spend less time exercising, or those who play low-impact sports, says a new study.
document.title: young female athletes at risk for stress fractures
lines_and_colors: girls who spend lots of time playing high-impact sports including gymnastics and basketball are twice as likely to suffer a small crack in their bones than girls who spend less time exercising, or those who play low-impact sports, says a new study.
